name: Once Bitten, Twice Shy (25 player)
descr: Defeat Blood-Queen Lana'thel once as a vampire and again without becoming a vampire in 25-player mode.
tooltip:
Once Bitten, Twice Shy (25 player)

Defeat Blood-Queen Lana\'thel once as a vampire and again without becoming a vampire in 25-player mode.

Criteria:
- Defeat Blood-Queen Lana\'thel without becoming a vampire
- Defeat Blood-Queen Lana\'thel while a vampire
